name: Sun Crush Original Bitter Lemon
description: Sun Crush is a popular Soft Drink brand that celebrates a healthy and fresh lifestyle. Sun Crush Imperial Bitter Lemon is the first Sparkling Canned Bitter lemon Soft Drink manufactured in Sri Lanka including Highest Quality Quinine. Designed to escalate the very best gins and vodkas. The blending of flavours with Reverse Osmosis Water which is filtered through UV disinfection system. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
